akrsh47/akrsh47.summary: Recent updates include modifications to the repository's README and profile details, such as adding a follower link and updating counts for views and followers. These enhancements aim to improve the user experience and provide more comprehensive information about the repository owner.

akrsh47/Sudoku-app.summary: The Sudoku application underwent significant improvements with the addition of an 'About' page, incorporation of media queries for better responsiveness, and updates to the home screen user interface.

profile_summary:
Akarsh Balachandran is a highly skilled web developer with a strong foundation in JavaScript and CSS, leveraging these core technologies to craft innovative, user-centric digital solutions. As an active member of the developer community, Akarsh has built a network of peers and has contributed to the growth of open-source projects through his public repositories. With a proven track record of delivering high-quality code, Akarsh has established himself as a reliable and competent developer who consistently delivers results.

Akarsh's expertise in front-end development has enabled him to create dynamic, engaging user experiences that cater to diverse client needs. As a forward-thinking developer, he stays up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, continually refining his skills to meet the ever-evolving demands of the digital landscape. Through his passion for coding and commitment to excellence, Akarsh has earned recognition within his professional network and is poised to continue making meaningful contributions to the world of web development.
